Scenario.UserTask: You would like to play a game of trivia. You've already answered some of the questions, so you should start from question 3 and play 5 questions. You have answers for the following questions: (5) wind, (7) do not iron, (2) canton. For the rest, try your best!
Scenario.WizardTask: Let the user play a trivia game. Query for and ask the questions until the user wants to stop.
